title: Design Activity Experiment for [K-12] Technology Education: Integrating Hand Drawing and CAD Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific theories and grasp of simple design processes
context.additional_context: Learners perform design activities in online/offline environments using personal devices, measuring outcomes through project-based assessments. The program emphasizes design approaches for solving practical problems in science fields

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three or more design alternatives using hand-drawn sketches and CAD tools.
Learners can systematically analyze sketches and digital files generated during design activities to derive optimal solutions.
Learners can comparatively evaluate the impact of design tool selection on creativity and problem-solving efficiency in technical education contexts.

resources: Digital Tablet or Graphic Design Tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
